---
name: User Story

  legible to a common user

labels: User Story
assignees: ''

---

**As a** *(User Type/Persona)* **I want** *(Feature/enhancement)* **So That** *(Value, why is this wanted, what is the user trying to accomplish)*

**Acceptance Criteria**
